entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
